comments.raw_text:
When rolling over a tab, show a preview image of that tab -- so contents can be quickly viewed by rolling over it -- before clicking on it.  Use a small thumbnail -- or just a more robust info box containing: From, To, Subject, First few lines of text.

Or, integrate "Tab Groups" option/code from latest version of firefox.
